data.actual_result: At random times, the response message sent by the bot is displayed above your message containing the command
data.expected_result: All messages should be sorted by timestamp with a precision of 1 millisecond
data.short_description: When two messages are sent almost simultaneously with less than ~30 milliseconds of delay, the messages seem to be displayed in a random order (or possibly alphabetically with the message content, not sure)
data.steps_to_repro: - There are many ways to reproduce, but I think the easiest is to find a bot with a really fast response time, and that introduces a ping command. A fast internet in terms of ping is also recommended. - Go to a channel where you have perms to send messages and where the bot is operating - Run the ping command several times, and pay more attention to those which display a response time < 30 ms
